title: [Flex Queue] Not promoted?
body:
hey riot, i was just playing your flex queue in my promos to silver, but when i won, i got into bronze 2????
something wrong with coding or flex queue? what do i do? i had played over 17 games,  and got to promos so i should get into silver or is it a ranked i will get when pre-season finished?

idk, rito repsond
